name: Before Impact: Meteor Fantasy
description:
Before the impact: Meteor Fantasy

"Before the impact: Meteor Fantasy" is a 2D auto-action RPG.

The game has been made during the LD50 in 72 hours.

Story (I can't wait for the movie adaptation!)

In the past, Drax Voder, evil incarnate, was defeated by a great hero. The last minions of Drax Voder went into hidding, awaiting for their revenge. Years later, a meteor is a about to fall on the planet. As a new hero rise to become powerful enough to destroy the celestial rock, Drax Voder's minions get out of the shadows, and start to cast a spell to speed up the meteor and make it crash on the planet before the hero gain too much power.

Now, the hero must stop the Cult of Drax before it's too late, and delay the inevitable!

Gameplay

In "Before the impact: Meteor Fantasy", you play as a hero travelling the world to become strong enough to stop an incoming meteor.

Monsters will try to stop them, and 3 groups of fanatics are channeling a spell to speed up the coming of the meteor.

At the start of the game, you need to get rid of some fanatic on an island to slow down the meteor.
For that you will start with a weapon. Weapons attacks on their own, you just have to move your character around to search for your target. You can know when a weapon is about to attack with the help of the ATA "Active Time Attack" on the lower left of the screen.

Once it's done, you will be granted and boat, and you'll be able to travel freely around the map, to find the other fanatics who are trying to speed up the meteor.

You can also find 4 mysterious altar, hidding incredible magical powers.

You will get attacked by swarming monsters, coming one after another. Every enemy drop an orb of experience. Gather them to gain levels.

Each time you level up, you will have to choose between 3 random upgrades. You can get a new weapon, a weapon upgrade or accessories.

You can only have 3 weapons, 3 accessories and 3 magic powers.
